page.title: 03CHELMARSH PRIMARY SCHOOL 1
page.content: The school was built in 1850 and is a solid building made of sandstone.There is a school house attached to the school which was renovated in 1983 by the Parent Teacher Association to provide extra teaching space.There are separate areas for computer studies,art and craft,photographic developing and printing and cookery. The children begin school in the Infant class for afternoons only when they are 4years 4months.At 4years 8months they come full time.When they are aged 7 they move into the Junior class which is taught by the Headmaster. The parents raise a lot of money to buy equipment for the school.Recently we have been given a camera,radio/cassette player and computer printer.
